description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Square' used as a UI element in a Tic-Tac-Toe game. It displays a game cell with icons representing players, handles user interactions, and manages visual states such as winning highlight and disabled state.

methods.name: Square
methods.description: React functional component rendering a game square with icon and styling based on its props.

methods.name: renderIcon
methods.description: Internal helper function to render the appropriate icon for 'X' or 'O' values.
